text: Double Negative is the twelfth studio album by Low, released on September 14, 2018. ==Critical reception== On Metacritic, which assigns a normalized rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, Double Negative has an average score of 86 based on 21 reviews, indicating "universal acclaim". Writing in Pitchforks list of the best albums of 2018, Marc Hogan said that "static prevails and flickering tones are almost untraceable to the instruments that made them," and that this sound "captured [2018's] pervasive dread like nothing else." ===Accolades=== {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade !
